attributes.action: Ban the public from purchasing fireworks
attributes.additional_details: The whole month of October and into November is torture for all animals and people with ptsd. Dogs have died from heart attacks, it causes them severe stress and anxiety. Former militants also suffer from ptsd and I don’t think people who have fought for our country should have to deal with this at any point in their life after leaving the service. They are also bad for our planet.
attributes.background:
Ban the public from purchasing and using fireworks. Introduce heavy fines and charges for anyone caught using them. 

Professional establishments need to apply for a specific date licence to use them.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for the same action:

Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639319
